wcs.java.util

Class XmlTestReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • RunListener
      • wcs.java.util.XmlTestReport

  • public class XmlTestReport
extends RunListener
    Prints XML output of the test to a specified Writer.
    See Also:
    FormatterElement
